title: Ep 52: How The Pod Sausage Is Made with Samee Junio
itunes:title: Ep 52: How The Pod Sausage Is Made with Samee Junio
itunes:subtitle: This week, Doree and Kate take a look back at a year of Forever35 and break down exactly what goes into making the pod. Plus, Doree reflects on her big year full of life changes, and Kate discusses how starting a gratitude practice and washing her face...
description:
This week, Doree and Kate take a look back at a year of Forever35 and break down exactly what goes into making the pod. Plus, Doree reflects on her big year full of life changes, and Kate discusses how starting a gratitude practice and washing her face on a regular basis has improved her daily life.

Then they welcome Forever35 producer extraordinaire, Samee Junio, who shares how their career shifted from massage therapy to podcasting, the best hair-shaping cream, what it’s like being an executive producer for a Netflix show, and their romance novel-worthy love life. Follow Samee on Instagram at It_Your_Sam.

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast,@katespencer,@doree, Twitter:@forever35pod, and in ourFacebook group(password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website,Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Beauty By Design - Visit beautybydesign.com/forever35 use promo code forever35 to receive 20% off your first order.
  • HelloFresh - For $20 off each of your first three boxes visit hellofresh.com/forever60 and enter promo code forever60.
  • ZOLA - To receive $50 off your registry on Zola, visit zola.com/forever35.
  • Poshmark - Get $5 off your first purchase when you use the invite code DOREESHA when you sign up (it's also Doree's closet name!)
  • Buffy - To get a complimentary free trial and $20 off your first comforter visit Buffy.co. and enter promo code forever35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
